line_1: The wild delirium each fresh draught renews;
Once more her Bloom the Earth renews,
line_2: Her Glebe still moist with fragrant Dews,

line_1: At Night the melancholly Strain renews;
But O! when downy sleep its court renews,
line_2: And shades the soul with visionary views,

line_1: In other terms his gratitude renews.
line_2: Ninus with other eyes her beauty views,

line_1: But Pharaoh soon his daring sin renews,
line_2: Blaspheming loud the rescu'd slaves pursues;

line_1: Their sight the late detested scene renews:
line_2: With stern regard each kindred face he views,

line_1: Big with the Fate of Europe he renews
line_2: His dreadful Course, and the proud Foe pursues:

line_1: The daring Prince his blasted Hopes renews,
line_2: And while the thick embattled Host he views

line_1: To Belgian Coasts his tedious March renews,
line_2: And the long Windings of the Rhine pursues,
Should Hope her lenient aid refuse,

line_1: Her voice the music of the dawn renews,
line_2: With her, the shades of night their horrors lose,

line_1: "The thousandth time the broken thread renews,
line_2: " And one great end with fortitude pursues;

line_1: And on Ramillia's Plains He Blenheim's Fame renews.
line_2: Again France flies: again the Duke pursues:

line_1: The soul whose sight all-quick'ning grace renews,
line_2: Takes the resemblance of the good she views,
